Unleash Epicness!

data.name: OldBetaInvite
data.value:
Congratulations! You’ve been selected to be one of a handful of people to see Epilogger before the open beta! If you’ve received this email that means that the Epilogger team holds you in high regard, and highly values your input. We’d be honoured by your feedback and you may very well see your suggestions in actions in the release version!

Here’s how to get started:

Step One: Make a new account
  • Create an account and update your profile picture, information, and add your Twitter and Facebook accounts.
Step Two: Have a look around
  • Try the Browse Events link at the top to see what’s happening around town.
  • You can browse by category at the bottom half of the page. You can see which events your Twitter friends are at!
  • Use the Feedback button at the left of your screen to give us your feedback, report a bug, or let us know if anything can be improved in the interface.
Step Three: Subscribe to events and check your dashboard
  • Find an event you like, click on it and subscribe to it with the subscribe button.
  • You should be able to see a feed of all your event subscriptions in your dashboard.
Step Four: Create an event
  • Create your own event and watch Epilogger track and record if for you by clicking “add an event” at the top of the screen.
If you have any questions outside of feedback please email us directly at team@epilogger.com

Sincerely,
Michael and Chris
Epilogger Inc.

Follow @epilogger on twitter or facebook.
http://epilogger.com		 info@epilogger.com
We’ll Remember!

data.name: OldWelcomeMessage
data.value:
Hi [FULLNAME]

Thank you for registering and taking part in epilogger.com, the new hot way to remember your life. Login and start epilogging!

data.name: ValidateEmail
data.value:
Hi [FIRST_NAME],

Validate your e-mail

Your email address isn’t verified in our system just yet. In order to be doubly sure that you’re not a robot we’ll need you to validate your email address. Don’t worry, it’s super easy. Just click here and you’ll be all set!

Thanks for using Epilogger, we hope you like it!

Get in Touch

  @epilogger
  facebook/epilogger
  info@epilogger.com

Hungry for more? Read our blog.

We publish event news and features every Tuesday & Thursday!

Problems?

If you run into any issues feel free to get in touch using the feedback tab on your right- we’ll be sure to get it.

Copyright © [year] Epilogger, All rights reserved.
You are receiving this email because you are a valuable early adopter of Epilogger. We appreciate your sign up!

Our mailing address is: Epilogger
221 Yonge St
Toronto, On M5B 1M4
Canada

data.name: WelcomeEmail
data.value:
Hi [FIRST_NAME],

Welcome to Epilogger!

We’re excited to have you join our community of awesome people and interesting events.

New to Epilogger? Here’s a mini tour:

Homepage: This is where you’ll find trending events and a live stream of photos from around the world. Click on any of them to go straight to their event page.

Event Pages: These are pages dedicated to single events. Here you will see information about the event, social media content, and some interesting stats. From there you can subscribe to an event, comment on and share photos, and so much more!

Browse Events: Up in the toolbar you’ll notice this menu. Here you can find events sorted by date, category, or even just the ones you have subscribed to.

Know what you're doing?

Why not try adding an event? If you aren’t sure what keywords to use, just start with the event’s official hashtag. From there you can add any words or phrases that people talking about your event might say if they were unsure of the official hashtag. By the way, just be sure to double check that it’s not already in the system before you jump right in.

 

Get in Touch

  @epilogger
  facebook/epilogger
  info@epilogger.com

Hungry for more? Read our blog.

We publish event news and features every Tuesday & Thursday!

Problems?

If you run into any issues feel free to get in touch using the feedback tab on your right- we’ll be sure to get it.

Copyright © [year] Epilogger, All rights reserved.
You are receiving this email because you are a valuable early adopter of Epilogger. We appreciate your sign up!

Our mailing address is: Epilogger
221 Yonge St
Toronto, On M5B 1M4
Canada
